title: Robot Arm Movement Control
description: Master robot arm classification and control through hands-on problem solving
learning_objectives: Understand robot arm degrees of freedom (DOF)
Classify robots based on their movement capabilities
Test classification systems with real robot data

task_requirements: Identify DOF for different robot configurations

hero_image.caption: Modern 6-DOF industrial robot arm - your challenge awaits

hints.text: Start by counting the joints that can move independently
Consider both rotational and translational movements
Look at the robot's workspace and reachability

quiz.question: How many degrees of freedom does a typical industrial robot arm have?

chat_contexts.task_help: Guide the learner through the robot classification task step-by-step
chat_contexts.dof_explanation: Explain degrees of freedom in robotics with visual examples
chat_contexts.classification_methods: Describe different approaches to classify robot arms
chat_contexts.quiz_failed: Provide remedial explanation for DOF concepts with visuals
chat_contexts.hints_exhausted: Offer detailed problem-solving guidance beyond basic hints
